title: Define Project Scope and Requirements - Revised
description: Gather and document the comprehensive requirements for the CultureFitAssessor tool, considering the needs of both employers and potential employees. This includes the desired features (e.g., personalized assessments, AI-based matching), user personas (e.g., HR managers, job seekers), onboarding process, assessment criteria, data privacy and security (GDPR, CCPA compliance), integration with existing HR systems, reporting and analytics, scalability for future growth, and usability for various devices and screen sizes. Ensure that the tool is accessible to all users and can be easily integrated into different hiring workflows.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the frontend, backend, database, and any necessary integrations or third-party services.

title: Develop User Interface
description: Design and implement the user interface for both employers and potential employees, ensuring a seamless and intuitive experience.

title: Implement Assessment Logic
description: Develop the core logic for assessing cultural fit based on the gathered requirements and the defined system architecture.

title: Set up Database and Data Storage
description: Design and implement the database schema and data storage solutions for storing assessment data, user profiles, and other relevant information.

title: Implement Security and Privacy Measures
description: Ensure the system adheres to best practices for security and privacy, including data encryption, user authentication, and access controls.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Establish a continuous integration and deployment pipeline to streamline the development, testing, and deployment processes.

title: Develop Testing Strategy and Automation
description: Create a comprehensive testing strategy, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests, and implement test automation frameworks.

title: Create Documentation and User Guides
description: Develop comprehensive documentation and user guides for both employers and potential employees, covering installation, configuration, and usage of the CultureFitAssessor tool.
